title: Basil Wolverton - The Bible Story
description:
OK everyone, we here at the LTS Comic Book Emporium hopes that all of us are enlightened enough to allow for the facts that everyone should be able to enjoy comic books, and that the same topic and/or subject matter can be discussed from many different points of view. Basically, please keep it civil.

-----------------------------------------------------

Fair warning: These are Christian/religious books. Although written by Basil Wolverton himself, this is full-on ministering of the Bible. Personally, from a study standpoint, I found what I read to be interesting and informative. However, Basil Wolverton was a member of a millenarian evangelical church called the Worldwide Church of God, a sect that believed in obeying Old Testament lifestyle laws and the literal truth of Revelations. As such, these books are very, VERY Christian in nature.

Weirdly, or maybe not, the series contains HUNDREDS of the most beautiful images Basil Wolverton ever created. Perfect perspective, wonderfully emotive faces, brilliant use of pointillism and cross-hatching. Definitely worth checking out for the art alone. And if it's your thing, maybe get in some good reading at the same time. If not, I'll upload the art book that was published with these images eventually.

The Bible Story

Written and Illustrated by Basil Wolverton

Worldwide Church of God, 1982-1988, 220-223 pages each
